name: communality
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the state or quality of being communal (= sharing things and having shared interests and hopes) : Food can be a potent symbol of a group's communality. I miss the communality of TV in the pre-digital age.
More examplesFewer examplesMy parents completely rejected the politics of solidarity and communality. Every community needs a space which is defined by its communality, i.e. an area where people can openly meet. For all his interest in communality, he is careful not to make too many claims of working-class solidarity.
